add_library(schemeshard-olap-indexes)
target_link_libraries(schemeshard-olap-indexes PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  services-bg_tasks-abstract
)
target_sources(schemeshard-olap-indexes PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tx/schemeshard/olap/indexes/schema.cpp

)
